h1_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit
h2_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Fight
content: The Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top fight can be challenging, especially since there are two foes to deal with instead of just one. Thankfully, one usually hangs back, giving you an opportunity to focus on one half of the iron ball at a time rather than having to tackle both for the entirety of the battle.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Top_Takes_Bottom,_Bottom_Takes_Top_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top fight can be challenging, especially since there are two foes to deal with instead of just one. Thankfully, one usually hangs back, giving you an opportunity to focus on one half of the iron ball at a time rather than having to tackle both for the entirety of the battle.
